Description: A furnished room is available in a prime location in Malden. All utilities included! It includes an armoire, a queen bed, desk, and 2 stands Move-in date: September 1st. We're located just 15 minutes from Boston; The Malden T (orange line) is located just 5 minutes from our home. You'll enjoy the conveniences of a covered back deck, dishwasher, electric stove, microwave, washer-dryer, assigned parking, and laundry in the unit. We are clean, quiet considerate, respectful, and easy-going and we're looking for someone with similar qualities. I also have a cat. It doesn't get any better than this! This room never lasts long with heat, water, electricity, and Wi-Fi. Send me a text or email. Please have good credit and references.
